subdisciplines.name: Exoplanet Astronomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of planets outside of our solar system, including their formation, composition, and behavior in relation to their host star.

subdisciplines.name: Stellar Evolution
subdisciplines.description: The study of how stars change over time, including their birth, life, and death.

subdisciplines.name: Stellar Astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical properties and behavior of stars, including their structure, atmosphere, and energy generation.
